ygData.subject: Re: Psalm Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: When I fight in windowed mode I DO get the white non melee damage text. I have had thorn barrier and my psalm going hitting for 13 per hit to me. Tuldar
ygData.messageBody:
When I fight in windowed mode I DO get the white "non melee damage" text. I
have had thorn barrier and my psalm going hitting for 13 per hit to me.


Tuldar
Tarrew Mar
-----Original Message-----
From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 <g4mntofcr@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, October 22, 1999 4:35 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Psalm Questions


>From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
>I know for certain that the messages for both songs appeared, i.e. "you
feel
>protected from cold". Can't confirm if the mob was actually taking damage
>from both of them though. Its hard to track all the messages that scroll
>through in a combat so when I got the confirmation that the song went into
>affect, just assumed that the mob was getting burned/frozen. Sure wish we
>got the white text message for our damage shields similar to what you get
>when you have the druid thorn buff (not certain of exact name). With the
>thorn buff, it tells you how much non-melee damage the mob took when they
>hit you. Anyone have an idea why we don't get a similar message?
>
>Galtin of E'ci
>
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: kim@... [SMTP:kim@...]
>> Sent: Friday, October 22, 1999 11:25 AM
>> To: eqbards@onelist.com
>> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Psalm Questions
>>
>> From: <kim@...>
>>
>> On Fri, 22 Oct 1999, Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 wrote:
>> >
>> > To recap, here is what I know about our resist buffs songs.
>> >
>> > 1) Elemental and Purifying rhythms do not stack together
>> > 2) Guardian Rhythms will stack with Elemental or Purifying.
>> >
>> > Need to confirm:
>> > 1) Do the rhythm series songs stack with the Psalm series?
>>
>> Guardian Rhythms stack with Psalm of Warmth, Cooling, and
>> Vitality. I haven't tested it with Purity or Mystic
>> Shielding. The Psalm series does not stack with any other
>> Rhythm song.
>>
>> I was unable to get Psalm of Warmth and Cooling to
>> stack. When your friend and you did it, did you get both
>> damage shields (10 points/hit at your level)? Or did they
>> cancel each other out since one burns the opponent while the
>> other chills it?
>>
>> --
>>
>
>>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
with the subject lol.
>
